DOC.brief_title: Time Prediction Complete Recovery From Neuromuscular Blockade After Visual Recovery With Double Burst Stimulation
DOC.detailed_description: Neuromuscular monitoring basic monitoring curarised patient . Acceleromiography use supervise neuromuscular blockade allow measure objective quantitative manner curarisation level surgery phase recovery neuromuscular blockade . Various parameter usually measure surgery : - T4/T1 ratio : ratio 4th 1st response `` train four '' stimulation ( TOF , 4 stimulation 0.2 m 2 ) . Neuromuscular recovery consider appropriate T4/T1 ratio > 0.9 - Double burst stimulation ( DBS ) : 2 short tetanic stimulation separate interval 750 m . It known DBSs induce visual and/or tactile response , T4/T1 recovery time > 0.6 . However , optimal recovery , T4/T1 ratio must > 0.9 . This study analyze interval moment DBSs visually identical T4/T1 ratio > 0.9 , anesthesia sheet patient undergone surgery tracheal intubation curarisation . Results define minimum time optimal recovery visually identical DBS response .
